channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat -- openshift/installer
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat -- openshift/installer

item.title: CVE-2019-19335|2024-08-05T02:16:46.713Z -- red%20hat -- openshift%2Finstaller
item.description: During installation of an OpenShift 4 cluster, the `openshift-install` command line tool creates an `auth` directory, with `kubeconfig` and `kubeadmin-password` files. Both files contain credentials used to authenticate to the OpenShift API server, and are incorrectly assigned word-readable permissions. ose-installer as shipped in Openshift 4.2 is vulnerable.
